articles.description: While still saying he is "entitled to personal attacks", Donald Trump seeks to shift his campaign focus to policy.

articles.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are visiting Colombia following an invitation from the vice-president.
articles.title: 'We are no longer debating facts', says Harry in Colombia

articles.description: A year-long investigation uncovered a vast ketamine dealing network, cover up attempts, another death, and led to five arrests - including doctors and a dealer who was known locally as "The Ketamine Queen".
articles.title: Matthew Perry death investigation: An underground drug network

articles.description: The mass deportation of undocumented immigrants would face legal and practical challenges - and cost billions.
articles.title: How would Trump’s promise of mass deportations of migrants work?

articles.description: Ms Paetongtarn brings a fresh face, and yet another member of the powerful Shinawatra clan to the top job.
articles.title: Paetongtarn Shinawatra: Thai heiress brings back divisive dynasty. But for how long?

articles.description: Swift closes the European leg of her tour with five record-breaking performances at Wembley Stadium.
articles.title: Eras Tour: Ed Sheeran joins Taylor Swift for Wembley show

articles.description: Robin Padilla made the remarks during a senate probe into sexual harrassment in the media industry.
articles.title: Backlash after Filipino MP says husbands have 'sexual rights'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: HMS Hawke was torpedoed by a German u-boat on 15 October 1914 and has lain undiscovered on the seabed.
articles.title: Lost wreck of WW1 ship HMS Hawke found in 'remarkable' condition

articles.description: China wants people to report Taiwanese "separatists", with the threat of death penalties for some.
articles.title: China's rhetoric turns dangerously real for Taiwanese

articles.description: At 37, she will be the country's youngest PM and the second woman in the post, after her aunt Yingluck.
articles.title: Thai parliament picks Thaksin's daughter Paetongtarn as new PM
